title: SignalK Discovery
description: Schema for SignalK discovery resources used to locate server endpoints.

endpoints.description: The set of endpoints known to this server

.*.description: The name of a group of endpoints at the same version level

signalk-http.description: The URL of a HTTP(s) REST API endpoint e.g. http://localhost/signalk/v1/api/

signalk-ws.description: The URL of a WebSocket streaming endpoint e.g. http://localhost/signalk/v1/stream

signalk-tcp.description: The URL of a tcp socket streaming endpoint e.g. tcp://localhost:55555
